name: Imperial Decree (V)
Lore: 'To Imperial command personnel: The Rebellion must be crushed! Minor acts of sedition are to be ignored. The destruction of the Alliance is your primary goal.',
Text: 'Deploy on table. At start of your turn, may lose 1 Force to activate this turn using [Light Side Force] instead of [Dark Side Force]. Whenever you lose Force (except from Force drains, battle damage, or your card), may reduce loss (to a minimum of 1) by the number of battlegrounds you occupy. (Immune to Alter.)',
